definition: to make an appointment/to invite/approximately/pact/treaty/to economize/to restrict/to reduce (a fraction)/concise
to weigh in a balance or on a scale
abbr. for 書經|书经[Shu1 jing1]

sentences.english: But Joshua and Kaleb, they disagreed.
sentences.chinese: 但是约书亚与迦勒，他们却不同意。

sentences.english: So Joshua burned Ai and made it a permanent heap of ruins, a desolate place to this day.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚将艾城焚烧，使城永为高堆，荒场，直到今日。

sentences.english: They said to Joshua, "The LORD has surely given the whole land into our hands;"
sentences.chinese: 又对约书亚说，耶和华果然将那全地交在我们手中。

sentences.english: Then Joshua let the people go away, every man to his heritage.
sentences.chinese: 于是约书亚打发百姓各归自己的地业去了。

sentences.english: And the king of Ai they took alive, and brought him to Joshua.
sentences.chinese: 生擒了艾城的王，将他解到约书亚那里。

sentences.english: I, Jeshua, was a man of flesh and blood.
sentences.chinese: 我，约书亚，是一个有血有肉的人。

sentences.english: In Joshua 7, we read the tragic story of Achan.
sentences.chinese: 在约书亚记第7章，我们读到亚干的悲剧。

sentences.english: Then Joshua and all Israel with him turned around and attacked Debir.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚和以色列众人回到底璧，攻打这城。

sentences.english: Also archaeological evidence contradicts the picture in Joshua.
sentences.chinese: 而考古学证据也与《约书亚书》的描述矛盾。

sentences.english: Joshua Bolten had a long and distinguished career in the Bush White House.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚在小布什执政期间，职业生涯成绩卓著。

sentences.english: Joshua had yet more help from heaven in this Holy War .
sentences.chinese: 在这场圣战中，约书亚得到极大的神助。

sentences.english: But your assistant, Joshua son of Nun, will enter it.
sentences.chinese: 伺候你，嫩的儿子约书亚，他必得进入那地。

sentences.english: Joshua also will cross over ahead of you, as the LORD said.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚必引导你们过去，正如耶和华所说的。

sentences.english: And Joshua discomfited Amalek and his people with the edge of the sword.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚用刀杀了亚玛力王和他的百姓。

sentences.english: In another scene she is seen getting close to co-star Joshua Bowman.
sentences.chinese: 在另一场景，她被认为是越来越接近合演约书亚猎户。

sentences.english: So Joshua overcame the Amalekite army with the sword.
sentences.chinese: 约书亚用刀杀了亚玛力王和他的百姓。

definition: Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Abe (short form for Abraham)/Abel, a figure of Jewish, Christian and Muslim mythologies
